alert.note: Alert for Brown; Eastern Cherry; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 3:10AM CDT until October 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Eastern Cherry, Brown and Rock Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM CDT this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
